title: Wireless Charger 4 in 1 for Apple Charging Station for iPhone 16 Pro Max/15/14/13 AirPods 4/Pro 2, iPad Stand Dock, Watch Charger for iWatch 10/9/Ultra 2, Charging Station for Apple Multiple Devices
description: ☑️【Charging Station for Multiple Devices Apple】- The upgraded 4 in 1 wireless charger dock can charge your iPhone, Apple watch, iPad and AirPods at the same time. It is a wireless phone charging station, an Apple watch charger, iPad stand holder, and also an airpods charger station. All-in-one design gives you a clean and tidy desktop. (iPhone, Apple watch, and earphones support wireless charging, iPad charging station belongs to wired charging.)

top_reviews.title: Charging Station
top_reviews.body: perfect; does what it's supposed to do. Read more
